org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.cloudlet.network

Class PacketSchedulerSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.cloudlet.network.PacketSchedulerSimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketScheduler

    public class PacketSchedulerSimple
extends Object
implements PacketScheduler
    Implements a policy of scheduling performed by a virtual machine to process network packets to be sent or received by its NetworkCloudlet's. It also schedules the network communication among the cloudlets, managing the time a cloudlet stays blocked waiting the response of a network package sent to another cloudlet.
    Since:
    CloudSim Plus 1.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg, Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

      • isTimeToUpdateCloudletProcessing

        public boolean isTimeToUpdateCloudletProcessing(Cloudlet cloudlet)
        Description copied from interface: PacketScheduler
        Checks if is time to update the execution of a given Cloudlet. If the Cloudlet is waiting for packets to be sent or received, then it is not time updated its processing.
        Specified by:
        isTimeToUpdateCloudletProcessing in interface PacketScheduler
        Parameters:
        cloudlet - the Cloudlet to check if it is time to update its execution
        Returns:
        true if its timie to update Cloudlet execution, false otherwise.

      • setVm

        public void setVm(Vm vm)
        Description copied from interface: PacketScheduler
        Sets the Vm that the PacketScheduler will sent packets from or receive packets to. It is not required to manually set a Vm for the PacketScheduler, since the NetworkHost does it when it creates a Vm.
        Specified by:
        setVm in interface PacketScheduler
        Parameters:
        vm - the Vm to set

      • addPacketToListOfPacketsSentFromVm

        public boolean addPacketToListOfPacketsSentFromVm(VmPacket pkt)
        Description copied from interface: PacketScheduler
        Adds a packet to the list of packets sent by a given VM, targeting the VM of this scheduler. The source VM is got from the packet.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
